original_text: And there were also sodomites in the land: and they did according to all the abominations of the nations which the Lord cast out before the children of Israel.
korean_text: 그 땅에 또 남색하는 자가 있었고 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 쫓아내신 국민의 모든 가증한 일을 무리가 본받아 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: And there were also sodomites in the land
and they did according to all the abominations
of the nations which the Lord cast out
